title.rendered: ClinLab Champs had a Blast at the Boston Corntoss Challenge!

content.rendered: This past Saturday ClinLab Staffing’s team of champions was spotted at the Alexandria Atrium in Boston, MA for a fun and friendly corntoss competition to help end ALS! This was the 6th Annual Boston Corntoss Challenge presented by ALS Therapy Development Institute (ALS TDI). 100% of proceeds went directly towards research.
